item.title: CVE-2023-4225|2024-07-26T15:05:45.215Z -- chamilo -- chamilo
item.description: Unrestricted file upload in `/main/inc/ajax/exercise.ajax.php` in Chamilo LMS <= v1.11.24 allows authenticated attackers with learner role to obtain remote code execution via uploading of PHP files.
